entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:31AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: Showers and thunderstorms continue across portions of the northern slopes of the Alaska Range. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:43PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sweetwater County through 615 PM MDT... At 542 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Creston Junction, which is also 20 miles northeast of Wamsutter, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Occasional gusts to 45 mph
